channel.title: Redash - How to Set Query Timeout in Redash v10.0
channel.description:
Hi can anyone help us to know, How to Set Query Timeout in Redash v10.0.
Thanks, Mandar Kulkarni

item.title: Redash - How to Set Query Timeout in Redash v10.0
item.dc:creator: MandarK
item.description:
Hi Doug,

Will I have to add these new environment variables in env settings?
After adding them, how should I use time limit in my queries ?

Thank you so much!

Best regards,
Mandar

Read full topic
item.source: Redash - How to Set Query Timeout in Redash v10.0

item.title: Redash - How to Set Query Timeout in Redash v10.0
item.dc:creator: DougTrajano
item.description:
Hi buddy.

You can use the REDASH_ADHOC_QUERY_TIME_LIMIT and REDASH_SCHEDULED_QUERY_TIME_LIMIT environment variables.

Environment Variables Settings

Read full topic
item.source: Redash - How to Set Query Timeout in Redash v10.0
